name: Select The Same Instance
description:
Allows you to select only instances with a specific variant from within a selection such as a group or frame. This can be used, for example, to select only those buttons in the selection that have a Size of Big and a Shape of Round.


How To Use

  1. Select the group or frame that contains the instance you want to select.
  2. Activate this plug-in.
  3. Choose the Component Set name.
  4. Select all the values of the variant you want to select.
  5. Press the Select button.


Is it difficult to understand? Please refer to the video.

https://cloud.nju33.com/6LKZbultMemOiNSamKev
